name: Jean Monnet Special Seminar: The EU Today
credits: 1 to 3; can be repeated with change in content up to 6 credits; Prereq: CPO 4104 or EUS 4210, and INR 4531 or EUS 4931, or instructor permission
description: Advanced variable topics on current European Union issues from multiple disciplinary perspectives, and taught by visiting EU scholar(s).
